extendedInfo.description: FOREXTrader for Android delivers many of the features and benefits available on FOREX.com. FOREXTrader for Android app includes native Android controls and a customized user experience. Place trades, manage positions, and access news, FOREX.com research & live chat. With FOREXTrader for Android youâll be able to: - View rates for over 50 currency pairs, including spot gold and silver.*- Trade with a variety of order types, including market, limit stop, OCO, If then, If then OCO,  and trailing stops.- Browse streaming headlines from Dow Jones Newswires and FOREX.com's proprietary FOREXInsider for current market commentary and analysis.- View interactive candlestick, bar and line charts for multiple time intervals.- Monitor economic data with an Economic Calendar.-Check account balances, P&L, and more. -Receive help from our customer support representatives via live chat.* Available products may be restricted due to residency. Spot Gold and Silver contracts are not subject to regulation under the U.S. Commodity Exchange Act. Placing contingent orders may not necessarily limit your losses.

reviews.title: Terrible and difficult to use
reviews.comment: There is always an annoying pop up box that always says \"operation failed\" and you always have to press \"okay\" to get rid of it. It\'s too annoying and puts you off using this darn app.
reviews.author: Jason Yu

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: nice and good app, it is very slow and it but needs more features like zoom and drowing on charts and more indicators
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Popup error, fix this bug
reviews.author: Faiq Ayubi

reviews.title: The application works great
reviews.comment: I like
reviews.author: Eyal Shamir

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: Why keep operation failed? Pls fix it.
reviews.author: lim ming jin

reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Jonathan Quintero

reviews.title: Give me browsing options
reviews.comment: I want to browse without making an account
reviews.author: Nenad Cuk

reviews.title: Poor performance!
reviews.comment: The app runs very poorly compared to iOS.. Although im on a practice account with forex, I do not recommened trading on this app, practice or live account!
reviews.author: Kevin Ibrahim

reviews.title: Error , error , error
reviews.comment: The app kept showing a trading error notice every 5-10 second very irritating
reviews.author: wang kang zhuang

reviews.title: Not comfortable with it
reviews.comment: Its stability is questionable. I am using a practice acct and it lost a whole order. Keeps telling authentication failed. I\'m definitely not going to use it with any real money.
reviews.author: Ian Lewis

reviews.title: super fast app
reviews.comment: very good
reviews.author: DEBASHISH MONDAL

reviews.title: The speed of the application.
reviews.comment: Takes forever to load and trade compared to the one in iOS. Very very slow. Very dangerous to trade on this app.
reviews.author: Veil Side

reviews.title: Below average
reviews.comment: This app can be used for checking the status existing open trades. Nothing  beyond.  Can\'t really image trading here because its way to slow. Trading could turn very dangerous!
reviews.author: Pooja Abraje

reviews.comment: In my HTC one v I couldn\'t see anything then first screen I.e. account one no other like trade and so on. Their is no facility where u can find p&l on trade basics means realized one. Need to improve those things even in full site.
reviews.author: suraj gosavi

reviews.title: Only one screen
reviews.comment: Stuck at \"accounts\" page once login. No sign of any way to move to trading panel etc.  Using galaxy note 2
reviews.author: harry poh cy

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I love it!
reviews.author: gabriel danckert

reviews.comment: Stupid
reviews.author: Corey Chance

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Why would I ever open a real account when I can\'t even connect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Only works with WiFi. Claims no internet available rest of time even though every other app works fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job! One caution.....
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Be very careful when entering your position. Chart may not be the one you think you\'re looking at. Doesn\'t always switch back automatically to the one you previously viewed. Other than that, bravo!
reviews.author: A Google User
